overview: Reagan Foxx is talking with her husband when her step-daughter Alina comes in and asks to use their bathroom. Alina needs help so Reagan joins her in the bathroom, but it's not the kind of help Reagan expected. Syren De Mer doesn't get any respect from her step-daughter Paige so she downloads an app that's supposed to help. The app works better than expected and when she gets home Paige wants to do anything to please her step-mom.
title: Mommy's Daughter 2
